If a ball or bullet ricochets, it hits a surface and moves away from it at an angle: The ball ricocheted off the goalkeeper and into the net. Synonyms
bounce
rebound

a ball or bullet that hits a surface and moves away from it at an angle, or an occasion when this happens : He was hit by a ricochet from a stray bullet. Their second goal was a ricochet. Synonyms
bounce (MOVEMENT)
rebound
More examplesFewer examplesThe bullet that ended up in a lampshade was most likely a ricochet.Do not fire at hard surface to prevent ricochet.The save was a lucky ricochet off his legs.
